reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress cute, comfortable, and well-made, with great material quality and thickness. They appreciate its fit, noting it hits right above the knee, and consider it perfect for fall and winter wear, with one customer mentioning it pairs well with a fitted tee or tank. The sizing receives mixed feedback - while some find it true to size, others report it runs big and is not suitable for petite customers. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Adorable dress bought in two colors!
items.body: I love this little corduroy dress so much that I ended up buying it in both the camel and the purple. It’s the perfect fall outfit — soft, cute, and easy to style with boots, tights, or a simple undershirt. I will say it runs a bit big. I’m 5’3”, normally a 0 in pants and a small/XS in tops, and the XS was perfect with the intended oversized fit. If you’re taller, it may run a little short, but for anyone 5’5” and under the length is great. Such a good staple piece for the price. Highly recommend! Read more
items.author: Lauren

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great fit!
items.body: Perfect fit and super cute! Very flattering as the cut was more fitted in the waist. Other similar style dresses are soo baggy and make you look big. The fabric was good quality, as well as the length. Wore it to Thanksgiving with a fitted white turtleneck underneath. Read more
items.author: Nicole

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for shorter curvy girls
items.body: This dress was super cute for a fall night out and I got it for our family Christmas pictures. I wore a lace long sleeve under and it was great and looked so cute. I will say it will shrink if you dry it (I did on accident) and now it’s soo short. Totally my fault. Also the material does get a weird wrinkle to it but it didn’t bother me too much. It’s flattering for curvy girls. I have a large chest and wide hips and I felt very comfortable in it. I wouldn’t recommend this for taller girls. Read more
items.author: Allysa

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Do not put in dryer
items.body: Dress is fine, but shrinks a lot! Sized down to give more shape, but after mistakenly tossing it in the dryer, I’m trapped wrapped in a blanket at my desk today. Read more
items.author: Samantha Griffin

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars perfect for the holiday.
items.body: The media could not be loaded. super cute! I got a size S and the color was like a fern Christmas tree (dark like the picture). Length was prefect, glad I didnt get an xs. Quality is good and thick shape is puffy and not tight. I would recommend. Read more
items.author: Tenabrie Custer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute cute cute
items.body: This was the perfect dress for my family pictures this fall! It’s true to color and the brown was my favorite! I typically buy a M but after reading other reviews the item does rub large so I got a small and I probably could have gotten an xs if I wanted a different figure, the small was loose but cute! Read more
items.author: Alexa Stewart

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great winter dress
items.body: Love the dress, does run big. Wearing an xs usually use size 2-4. Super comfy. Great for the winter. Love the pockets, definitely fits phones. Read more
items.author: Helen Martinez

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Fall Dress
items.body: I ordered the dress in size Large. For reference, I’m 5’4”, 195 lbs, and wear a 38 DDD. The dress itself is really cute and hits about 2” above my knees, which is a nice length on me. However, it was too tight in the bust area, so I’d recommend sizing up if you’re larger in the chest. The corduroy fabric and style are great overall but keep fit in mind when choosing your size. I’ll be returning the Large and reordering in an XL. Read more
items.author: Haley Noland

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
about_this_item:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Darkgreen, Winered, Brown, Khaki, Pink, Purple, Black, Darkgrey, Dustyblue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
